name: TofuTengo
description:
A  sports game made during a 24 hours long Hackathon. This playable prototype is based on the street version of football tennis otherwise known as tengo. The goal is to score points by hitting the ball and making it bounce twice in the opponent's area. 

You can kick everything, including other players. 

Kick the Pinata to begin the match :)

Controller Support

Xbox One and XBox 360 gamepads are fully supported and enable both 1v1 and 2v2 game modes.

Keyboard Controls

Keyboard controlas are only available for the 1v1 game mode.

Player 1:
  • WASD to move
  • F: Action (Jump/Kick/Interact)
Player 2:
  • Arrow keys to move
  • K: Action (Jump/Kick/Interact)
Team Tofu
  • Diana "didu" Slezak (Art & Character design)
  • Dora Cserkesz (Playtesting & Sport expert)
  • Laszlo "rootshaper" Bajnoczi (Sound design)
  • Mate Cziner (Game design, Development)
  • Daniel "Houruck" Molnar (Game design, Project Management)
